grins
Interface SMILController

public interface SMILController

The interface for controlling playback of SMIL documents. SMILControllers are produced by SMILDocuments using the method getController(); see interface SMILDocument

Method Summary
 void addListener(SMILListener listener)
          Add a playback event listener for the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
 double getSpeed()
          Get playback speed for the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
 double getTime()
          Get current position in seconds of the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
 void pause()
          Pause playback, of the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
 void play()
          Start playback, of the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
 void removeListener(SMILListener listener)
          Remove playback event listener for the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
 void setSpeed(double v)
          Set playback speed for the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
 void setTime(double t)
          Seek to time t in seconds within the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
 void stop()
          Stop playback, of the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
 

Method Detail

play

public void play()
Start playback, of the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.

stop

public void stop()
Stop playback, of the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.

pause

public void pause()
Pause playback, of the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.

setTime

public void setTime(double t)
Seek to time t in seconds within the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
Parameters:
t - time in seconds to seek to.

getTime

public double getTime()
Get current position in seconds of the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.

setSpeed

public void setSpeed(double v)
Set playback speed for the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController. (null implementation for now)
Parameters:
v - new speed.

getSpeed

public double getSpeed()
Get playback speed for the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController. (returns always 1.0 for now)

addListener

public void addListener(SMILListener listener)
Add a playback event listener for the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
Parameters:
listener - the object that will receive playback notifications.

removeListener

public void removeListener(SMILListener listener)
Remove playback event listener for the SMIL document controlled by this SMILController.
